game_description: The Wild is an immersive collaboration platform that uses virtual and augmented reality to help architecture, design, engineering, and enterprise teams save time and make better decisions by experiencing their work together, immersed in a shared virtual space. With native support for SketchUp, Revit, and BIM 360, The Wild aims to shape the future of collaboration by connecting people and their ideas across distance into a shared experience. For more information, visit thewild.com.
review_1: I type in the pairing code online and type my email in and it says something went wrong when i click forgot password. This is why i quit screwing with it months ago and it still does it.
review_2: I REALLY WANT THIS PROGRAM TO BE AVAILABLE FOR ORDINARY PEOPLE AND DO NOT REQUIRE A WORKING MAIL ADDRESS WHEN REGISTRATION. ОК.
